title: List Lesson
purpose: The purpose of this module is to learn about Counter-Balancing Lists, why they are used, and how to make them
procedure: During the lesson, you will be going over a number of topics on lists. Afterward, you will have a quiz to test your knowledge
riskAndBenefits: There are no known risks associated with participating in this lesson. However, by participating, you will contribute to scientific research in the field of education.
